overview: December 7, 1941 - TOMIKAZU “TOMI” NAKAJI (Kyler Ki Sakamoto) and his best friend BILLY DAVIS (Kalama Epstein) are playing baseball in a field near their homes in Hawaii when Japan launches a surprise attack on the US at Pearl Harbor.  As Tomi looks up at the sky and recognizes the Blood-Red Sun emblem on the fighter planes, he knows that his life has changed forever.  Based on actual events, Under the Blood-Red Sun is an unforgettable story of friendship, courage and survival.
tagline: From the book by Graham Salisbury
title: Under the Blood-Red Sun
